```{r}
#Wrangling the dataset 

#Removing columns and rows conatining weblinks and other metadata 
Health_Data_Clean <- Health_Data_Raw[-c(1,2,3),-c(1,3, 4, 5, 6)] 

#Using a pipe to select and rename columns
Health_Data_Clean <- Health_Data_Clean %>%
  select(Bold.Indicator.Name.Text, NC, X.9, X.31, X.82, X.78) %>%
  rename(Indicators = Bold.Indicator.Name.Text, Bladen = X.9, Duplin = X.31, Sampson = X.82, Robeson = X.78)


```
